article.title: Insitu Supports Afghanistan Operations with ScanEagle Imagery
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Insitu Incorporated, Bingen, Washington, is being awarded a $41,090,719 ceiling priced contract modification for operational and maintenance services in support of the ScanEagle unmanned aerial systems. These services will provide electro-optical/infrared and mid-wave infrared imagery in support of land-based operations in Operation Enduring Freedom to provide real-time imagery and data.Â The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
